comment: Tomoko Sensei is super sweet and caring. She's hilarious and will really help to improve your Japanese. There were a lot of assignments, but overall it was all easily manageable. You will love this class and the teacher.

Tomoko sensei is easily one of the best teachers I have ever had. She is always smiling, and works very hard to ensure we understand the material. More than that, she is genuinely kind, and obviously loves sharing her language and culture.

Professor Sommer is amazing. Really understanding and very nice. Just like most foreign language, homework is incredibly important and comprises a lot of your grade, so make sure to do it. The schedule will be your best friend in this class.

She's  amazing. She has an adorable Japanese accent but she's very clear most of the time. Participation and being responsible with your assignments is whats going to carry you through the class. Also make sure to study outside class its the only way you'll survive because the course moves quickly
